description: The Urban Meadow is a community space consisting of an open grassy space, a field of wildflowers, and a grove of magnolia trees.  It is perfect for individuals to relax in and escape their urban surroundings or for hosting community gatherings and events.
private events: members only (no non-members can rent garden)
name: Brooklyn's Finest Garden/The Greene Room
open hours: MT 6am-8am, W 5pm-8am, R 5pm-8pm, SSu 12pm-5pm. The Garden is also open in the AM on Weekdays and from 5:30 PM- 8:30 PM on Weeknights. These times vary.
